website_summaries.verdict: Who says boots are just for winter? Basel 3 is a great pairing with your skinny jeans and skirts when it's time to put the warm, fuzzy boots away.
pros: A great look for spring and summer
Better for posture than higher-heeled alternatives
Socks are not visible through the perforations
Comes in a variety of colors
Leather upper with large perforated detail throughout
cons: May run small, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Boots fit great, and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit great, and are very comfortable . This is my second time purchasing Lucky brand boots and I love them .
customer_reviews.author: Monique Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ♥♥♥♥♥
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. Stylish and comfortable. I can wear them all day despite the joint problems. Feet do not get hot - perfect summer boots. I wear 7.5 and I got 7.5 and the size is just right. On the side note: leather stains. Someone dropped a piece of apricot on the shoe so I had to wipe it with water right away. The area I washed looks darker when it dried. There is no dirty spot from fruit juice. The color is just darker now. So I wiped both boots with water entirely and now they are same darker color. BTW, I like the new color :) So maybe spray them with suede protector before going out.
customer_reviews.author: AmeriGirl

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a mix between taupe and gray
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to boot that seems to go with anything (bought the dark stone color). It looks like a mix between taupe and gray. It fits just perfect! I wear a size 8 normally and that's what I ordered. I can even wear a thin sock with them. The holes do make them a little "cool" in the winter and probably not water repellent by any means. But I live in SC so that's not a concern. Would definitely order again. This is my second pair of Lucky boots and I love them both.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Losch

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfy bootie!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in the dark stone color and they just arrived yesterday. Love them!!! Right out of the box they are soft and supple, and despite some of the reviews stating that they run narrow, I didn't find that to be the case. I ordered in my usual size (8) and in medium width they are perfect for my 'sometimes needs a wide width' foot. There does, however, seem to be an extra bit of room at the toe, so perhaps I could have gone with a 7 1/2 instead. Either way, I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Neilson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my closet
customer_reviews.text: I thought these looked nice in the photos, but they're even better in person! The leather is so soft, and I've been able to wear them without socks with no risk of blisters. Love the zippers on each side, and the perforation will make these a great option for warmer days. Also, the heel isn't too tall, so they're comfortable to wear as a more casual boot than some of my others. I got the dark stone color, but am tempted to buy the black ones, too.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Cute spring/fall boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great spring fall boots. The fit is a little odd for me-I have a somewhat narrow or maybe thin foot. There is room for a very thick sock which I will never wear. I usually take a 7, Length is good just maybe because the material is soft and flexible it feels a bit bulky? Hard to explain I am keeping them but don’t plan to walk miles in them.
customer_reviews.author: m. Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and so cute! I bought these in bisque and love them! I usually wear size 6.5 or 7. I ordered these in a 7, and they fit well. They have a tiny bit of room, but are perfect with socks, so I would say true to size!
customer_reviews.author: nyactorgirl

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have never worn this brand and was not sure what size to order; I wear an 8 or 8.5 depending on the brand. I ordered the 8.5 but need this in an 8 so I have to send this one back. Hope they have an 8 in this as it's a very cute shoe. Looks great with jeans and capris. I love the color, it can be worn with just about anything. I was pleased that this shoe felt pretty comfortable. The arch support seemed a little lacking but I think it's because the shoe is too big on me. The foot bed is lightly cushioned and feels nice, at least it does walking around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Booties!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bootie! I have 2 other pairs that I've worn almost daily for the last 7 months. My feet feel so comfortable in them. It's also good for my feet, back, and posture not to be wearing an elevated heel. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: japc

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots, but nothing comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: the perfect color and style. However, the comfort level is not the highest. They are very flat and hard at the bottom and my bunions do not love using them all day. I think the leather will stretch and soon I will be better in width. They are super cute. But I know I do not want to walk all day in them!
customer_reviews.author: Haztive Dominicana

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lucky Women Boot
customer_reviews.text: I got size 6 color Bisque due to the lowest price comparing with other color. It is a comfortable boot; and it is also good for warm weather because of leather upper features large perforated detail throughout. The air can get into the boot in warm weather. The Heel Height: 1 1⁄2 inches is right height for me. I am glad to find this kind of boot I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and comfortable, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this boot as an on-trend alternative to my work shoes. I ordered an 8.5 wide because I knew I could add insoles if they were a bit loose, and I plan to wear thin black socks with them. I'm very pleased. I chose the dark stone - similar to a nice gray. They are going to look nice with dress work pants or with jeans. I think they're appropriate year-round. You do slightly see your sock fabric beneath the holes, so dark socks or black hose will look fine.
customer_reviews.author: 3rd Box Car

customer_reviews.title: Great for all year round!
customer_reviews.text: These booties are so cute. You can wear them with jeans in the fall. Because they have little holes they work great with jean shorts in the summer! They are comfortable and I get a lot of complements on them! For more style inspiration and affordable fashion connect with me on IG @love.ericamarie or fb under Erica's Deals, Steals, and Finds! XOXO, Erica Marie
customer_reviews.author: Erica's Deals, Steals, & Finds

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them! They are super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Lucky Basel Ankle Boots. I absolutely love them! They are super comfortable, I wrote them all day today, brand new out of the box, and had no problem whatsoever! I'm am art teacher and I spend the majority of the day on my feet. I highly recommend these boots and plan to get more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: kimmyw24

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have problem feet and chose these because I thought that because of the perforations they might not irritate my foot, especially where the bunion is. I was right. they're great and stretch out well, which is what I'd hoped. Nice looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfectly what I expected from photos and Brand Name. They are comfortable and sturdy - the heels are perfect. They don't have the cushion that walking boots have but are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: View Junkie

customer_reviews.title: The perforations add comfort
customer_reviews.text: Having the perforations allows more stretch with the leather, so if you have width or toe box issues, this boot is very comfortable. The style and quality are great too.
customer_reviews.author: JennyCT

customer_reviews.title: very good booties
customer_reviews.text: I like these booties very much ;I I wish they were peep toe but that's alright still nice boots ,I usually take an 8half ;but they were to long on the length; so I ordered a size 8 and they fit better ;I like the natural colour goes with everything ,I am sure if you get these you will love them to . and the price is good .
customer_reviews.author: Susan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Comfy Bootie
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mom after she commented on mine. She's 86 and love them. Super comfy and stylish and the ankle opening is narrow. They look so good with jeans or dresses or skirts!
customer_reviews.author: andrea l. brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great casual bootie!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, beautiful color. Look nice with jeans, leggings or a skirt. Very happy with this purchase. I usually wear size 8.5 in closed toe boots, but I ordered size 8 and they fit great
customer_reviews.author: R. Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, Great look, soft material
customer_reviews.text: Lucky brand always runs on the small side for me, so I know I need a size 9 when I normally wear size 8-8.5. So they fit and look great!!! So happy to have them for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Muchow

customer_reviews.title: It was a nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice looking shoe, a great design,with great vent holes to keep your feet cool. Unfortunately to was too small plus the high front bothered the top of my foot, the front portion should be cut lower. I order the size larger but it to was not comfortable for my foot since I have a high in-step.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Smotra-Cook

customer_reviews.title: Too small but very cute
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7 or 7 1/2 but these were too small. I haven't returned them but may just resell since shipping back is a hassle. The quality is amazing and they are super cute, just go a size up!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Cool

customer_reviews.title: the fit were perfect. I was concern the color would be a ...
customer_reviews.text: Received boots today, they came sooner than expected.. They looked exceptional exactalty what I was looking for, the fit were perfect. I was concern the color would be a bit off or they would be small! But they are just perfect very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nyjints86

customer_reviews.title: ... against the bottom of my legs and that was pretty annoying. I had indents in my skin after ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes but I'm returning because the shaft hit against the bottom of my legs and that was pretty annoying. I had indents in my skin after wearing them around the house for an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Pandas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable because of the perforated suede making them nice and ...
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments when I wear these-even from men!!. Incredibly comfortable because of the perforated suede making them nice and cool on the warmer days when sweat would pool in other leather booties. This is my "Back Up Pair" because I know they will all be gone soon. The absolute best buy of the Spring!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherjo

customer_reviews.title: Cute boot!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun boot and will do well on an average foot. I exchanged once for a half size up from my usual size, but had to return because the bigger one was a bit sloppy on my narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: SuM.

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Lucky boots as they fit me the best. I have these in taupe and was waiting for the gray in my size. These are great, very comfortable and I get compliments all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: Shayne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Spring Bootie
customer_reviews.text: These boots are comfy and stylish! I got several compliments the first day I wore them and one girl who noticed them knew the exact brand! I felt like a rock star in them and can't wait to wear them in New Orleans!
customer_reviews.author: C. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Very comfortable and I wear a sock with them. Did not see sock through the holes either. So happy with them. I wear 8 to 81/2 in most shoes. The 8 fits great with a sock. Probably a bit to big w/o sock.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: SECOND PAIR!!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair and I love these! No socks ! They are so comfortable and I can walk a country mile in these boots.
customer_reviews.author: conniesdavis

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a pair of lucky boots and they worked out great and love them
customer_reviews.text: I had to send back unfortunately they were too large at the end of the toes. Cute color and well made. I wish they would have been more rounded at the bottom. I purchased a pair of lucky boots and they worked out great and love them.!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cadiluv14

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice bootie! Great color. Looks gray sometimes and tan others, depending on what is worn.
customer_reviews.author: dalene dabb

customer_reviews.title: I personally didn't like the way they looked on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Not as cute in person. I personally didn't like the way they looked on my feet. They fit, but it felt like the open-hole leather would give too much and ultimately make them feel too big. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: blazenreba

customer_reviews.title: Runs True - Grey is Warm Not Cool
customer_reviews.text: Love. I have a high arch and there is adequate room through that area. Toe box could be a little more roomy but not bad. The design with the holes help keep my feet cool so I’m excited to be able to wear in the summer months. Color is a little more stone than grey, or maybe like a warm grey, not a cool or blue undertone.
customer_reviews.author: AjA

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great, good looking and comfortable right out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Many, many compliments. Shoes are great, good looking and comfortable right out of the box, even with my high arches. Also cool from perforations, nice change from sandals. Even non-shoe type persons and strangers have complimented.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: They feel like slippers. The leather is a good quality
customer_reviews.text: They feel like slippers. The leather is a good quality, the zippers are excellent not that flimsy kind that you know in a few tugs it will break. I will be putting my own insole, I want to enjoy them all winter. I'm in Florida so these will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: pie856

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are more comfortable than you would think! They are see through, so be mindful of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Cubbage

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty, unique.  Needed 9.5 usually I wear a 9 in other brands but I always go half size up in Lucky brand
customer_reviews.text: Okay, Lucky runs narrow and small in my experience so I learned from past experiences to buy in a half size up and then they are perfect fit. These are really pretty and unusual, I always get compliments when I wear any of my lucky brand shoes. These are an unusual fleshy/peach/nude color.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Love❤️
customer_reviews.text: I adore these boots! They are perfect for spring/summer! I usually wear a size 8 and I ordered an 8 1/2 because I do have bunions from wearing high heels for years! I'm going to keep the 8 1/2 but I think a size 8 would have been totally fine. I have a large family and own a restaurant and I am on my feet constantly and they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: LOve these! Due to the little holes you can even wear them in the summer time 😬 The style is classic. I have that sane shoe in multitude of different different colors lol. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Becca Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes I bought without fitting! They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Good looking ankle boot
customer_reviews.text: This boot fits True to size and very nice looking. Do know that the small holes that make up the design are open, so they wouldn't be the best to wear in wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I love these booties
customer_reviews.text: I love these booties!! I plan to buy the gray ones very soon. They're cute and comfortable and go with so many things!! I love them. Found them true to size, but not much arch support. However, I haven't found that to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: These are super comfy like all of the other reviews mention
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy like all of the other reviews mention! I love the style and the color is great. I ordered an 8 1⁄2 (usually I wear an 8 or 8 1⁄2) and they fit perfect. I wear short no-show black socks with them and they look fine, although with the holes in the shoes you can see them a little bit. I'm excited to wear them more as it gets cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite short booties!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much I have them in multiple colors! Extremely comfortable all day...true to size.. Best little booties 💞💞
customer_reviews.author: Jodyj39667

customer_reviews.title: Love the boot
customer_reviews.text: I went a size up cause I have a wide foot. Love the boot. The color is great goes with anything. Going to order another color. Very comfortable, you can wear a thin sock under it .
customer_reviews.author: leyona ferrara

customer_reviews.title: My Kind of Boots -  Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Just wore them for the first time today. Their are attractive, stylish and very comfortable. They look better in person. I did order a half size larger. I wear size 9 shoes so i ordered size 9.5 U.S. Hopefully they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: cc cpt

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and fit. Wore for a funeral service.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Cute; run big
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. I am a 7.5 but sized down to 7.0 and they are still too large. I am going to keep them and put a heel cushion in.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie L

customer_reviews.title: Best of both worlds: very comfortable & great looking
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Basel booties. The fit just as expected & looks great. Before I wear them outside I'm going to apply a silicon spray to protect the nubuck leather.
customer_reviews.author: Budzma

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly like the picture and fit as expected. Great summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Evans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I was so apprehensive about buying shoes on-line! But these fit perfect and are so comfy. I know I'll be getting a lot of wear out of them. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these Boots
customer_reviews.text: Do Not buy these boots. They are the right size but they are so hard and ungiving on the heel. I have tried to wear them twice and get severe blisters. I have tried bandaids, socks, cushioning. It is too bad as I love them but am not able to wear them. Even with all the cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great wardrobe addition
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! They're very comfortable and go with so many outfits. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: LVChick

customer_reviews.title: Love the low boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the low boots! They fit fine, but I wish there was more of an arch support: I bought arch supports for them so hope that solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: California gal

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My second pair! I usually am a 7.5-8. Def get a 8!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Leather is thick ... but is beautiful and true leather
customer_reviews.text: Leather is not thick .... but is a really nice ankle boot... my wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: RandomExpress

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots. They are very comfortable and I get many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa H. Schrick

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a comfortable and well fitting shoe for a while and finally tried lucky brand and I wasn’t disappointed. The sole is soft and there’s good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Versatile boots for all seasons. Great fit!!! Looks great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. The boots are true to size. I will enjoy this pair of boots for all seasons. This pair of boots are versatile I would recommend these boots to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Pousardien

customer_reviews.title: The color is lighter
customer_reviews.text: Such as nice ankle boot , my wife loves it . Good quality , true leather .
customer_reviews.author: RandomExpress

customer_reviews.title: Love the gray-green color of these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the gray-green color of these boots! This style is very easy to wear from the beginning of putting them on. The perforations allow the foot to breathe in the boot.
customer_reviews.author: LWH

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They are really comfortable, and I seldom find any boots or shoes particularly comfortable. I've never worn Lucky brand before, but I will definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Fran C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: These are the 5th pair of Lucky brand bootie that I own .. I have them in different colors .. They are stylish and can be worn with many different things.. No breaking in on these booties so comfortable right out of the box.. I LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelclrk

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boots, but much too small. Returned and found a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: MiMiMarie

customer_reviews.title: they're comfortable, but I think they were somewhat snug in ...
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, I'm on my feet most of the day. Overall, they're comfortable, but I think they were somewhat snug in the toes and I have a narrow foot. Maybe order a 1/2 size bigger?
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable ankle boots. I have in multiple colors because I wear them so often.
customer_reviews.author: Megan O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Such a great boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cool, I love the color and the shoe molds to your foot with still giving you all day support. I've worn them twice and gotten compliments both times!
customer_reviews.author: Nouna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable boots and very fancy... My man fell on them
customer_reviews.author: Bozana

customer_reviews.title: No slip heel!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are super comfy for wearing all day. I was concerned that the heels might slip (I’ve sprained an ankle wearing boots that have slipped on tile) but they don’t. The rubber on the heel is softer than some heels.
customer_reviews.author: Surfergirljenn

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a nearly daily wear for me. The leather fits my foot perfectly for walking the 30 minutes each day to work and an active day at work. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Genna T.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a family member. They fit well and look as pictured. They are great for both casual and formal occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor9896

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and cute!!! Look great with leggings, skinny jeans or even a skirt !!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: color looks off from what I ordered and kind of snug
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable out of the box! They are tres cute!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and trendy
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift to my daughter and she loves them. Very trendy. Comfortable because of the low heel.
customer_reviews.author: MByron

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes that I have and they breathe
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes that I have and they breathe! I live in them and get compliments every where that I go.
customer_reviews.author: Soulschool

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had these shoes before! So cute, so comfy and authentic lucky shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer campbell

customer_reviews.title: Everyday wear.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, stylish and great dressed up or kicking around all day. Sockies or not.
customer_reviews.author: macklady

customer_reviews.title: Good summer bootie.
customer_reviews.text: Great look for this spring and summer. The bisque color looks pretty with white jeans and khaki accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie

customer_reviews.title: Color lighter than shown
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and comfy but not the color shown in the picture. The sesame color is much much lighter than shown in the photo. I will keep but wish they were darker.
customer_reviews.author: JReady

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought them twice by mistake so I returned one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but zipper jams
customer_reviews.text: beautiful boot. C width was perfect fit as these run narrow. unfortunately, one of the zippers was defective so had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have so enjoyed these shoes. Every time I wear them I get compliments. Comfortable also. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Joy Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: have purchased a second pair in a different color. Great shoe
customer_reviews.author: msb

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and style
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and style. They are perfect for spring and summer and were comfortable the first time I wore them!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bootie
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I receive compliments every time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Dyan M Lurtsema

customer_reviews.title: Love this bootie
customer_reviews.text: Love these...got lots of compliments. Great transitional boots for warm autumn weather. Tried with socks and without..comfortable both ways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to Size.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9, I ordered a 9 and they fit great. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Fits great and looks smart. Received lots of compliments. I wear size 6 1/2 m
customer_reviews.author: Anne Sue Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: a these books run a bit large, I wear an 8 1/2 normally but got an 8 and they fit great. Very comfortable boots.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these booties so much, I bought them in 2 different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Simpson

customer_reviews.title: I still love them very much though
customer_reviews.text: These tend to get bigger as you wear them. I still love them very much though!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite pair of boots. They are so comfortable and great quality !
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These booties are amazing. I'm so glad I got them. They're very comfortable, look fantastic and seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: theothergoodstylist

customer_reviews.title: I love the fit and style of the boots BUT was ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and style of the boots BUT was very disappointed to have the leather scuff and flake after just a few wears. Really too bad. Not impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Great fall booties
customer_reviews.text: Great fall booties. Very comfortable, can walk around all day in them. They look good with jeans and skirts. Love the Dark stone color. Get compliments every time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Could walk in these all day - can't even feel them on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: P McD

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty & I love the color
customer_reviews.text: They are snug & I am not sure I will keep them! They are pretty & I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: J T Wawrzynski

product_meta.title: Lucky Brand Women's Basel3 Ankle Bootie
product_meta.description:
Bootie

Rooted in rock 'n' roll with a signature sense of humor, Lucky Brand stands for independent thinking, individual style and a feeling as authentic as love. Friends since youth, creators Gene Montesano and Barry Perlman shipped the first order of Lucky Brand in 1990, and have been renowned for their great-fitting jeans and vintage-inspired apparel and accessories ever since.
feature_bullets: Ankle boot in allover perforated leather featuring dual side zippers
